    Product Description
    High-capacity Battery

    The Redmi 8A features a 5000-mAh high-capacity battery, so you can watch more videos, click more pictures, play more games on a single charge. What’s more? It also supports 18 W Fast Charge, so you can get back in action, in no time.

    High-definition Display

    This smartphone comes with a 15.8-cm (6.22) HD+ Display which ensures that you get an immersive viewing experience whether you’re watching videos or playing games. Also, it features the Corning Gorilla Glass 5 so that the display is well-protected against accidental falls.

    Click Amazing Pictures

    Featuring a 12 MP AI primary camera, the Redmi 8A takes your smartphone photography up a notch.

    Next-level Selfie Game

    With its 8 MP AI selfie camera and features such as the AI Selfie Portrait and the AI Face Unlock, you can capture amazing Instagram-worthy selfies.

    Aura Wave Grip Design

    Its Aura design features a new wave grip pattern at the back which is fingerprint-resistant and provides a better handgrip. It is also splash-proof by P2i, so you don’t have to worry about getting a few splashes on your phone.

    Powerful Processor

    Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 439 processor and 2 GB of RAM, the Redmi 8A lets you game or multitask seamlessly. It also comes with 32 GB of ROM which is expandable up to 512 GB, so you can store all your pictures and videos without any hassle.

    AI Face Unlock

    Say goodbye to complex passwords as the Redmi 8A comes with the AI Face Unlock feature, which makes unlocking your phone a breeze.

    Wireless FM Radio

    With powerful speakers and a 0.82 CC acoustic chamber, you can now enjoy your favourite songs with loud and undistorted sound.
